name: Happyride.se White Theme
description:
White theme for swedens happiest bicycle site (forum part).
Consider this as an experiment to show what can be done.
additional_info:
Known bugs:

When having really small window the forum changes totally and that makes some colors weird.

18 feb 2016: Navbar bugfix middle size/small size
             Border around forum list improvement
             Extra border around posts removed
             Search symbol colored
             Quote bar colored
    
15 feb 2016: Fixed width 800px.
             Header color fix.
             Button-colorfix.
             Heading size smaller.
             Header menu items font smaller.

11 feb 2016 evening: Fixed some bugs and added whiteness to main forum list also.

11 feb 2016 day: First release.
